title: Permanent Ban Unwarned
body: I received a notification on client (no e-mail) for a 14 day suspension for toxicity. Okay fine I'll take that I am toxic because people troll. Anyway then 14 days later I try to log in but I have been permanently banned? What kind of bs is this? I'm not here to type a paragraph about how much RIOT doesn't care about their customers, I'm here to complain that I was given a permanent ban when it said 2 weeks. Also I have never ONCE gotten an email about bans? I have been 14 day suspended on one account, then banned, this case, and also a suspension on a third account I had to start fresh because RIOT love to fuck up my life. either I get this mistake solved, or I get the reason why the mistake wasn't a mistake and how they don't email people for account bans.

replies.body:
Post your chat logs here if you think it's unfair.

I read your logs, and I can tell you it looks like a correct ban to me.

> and also a suspension on a third account I had to start fresh because RIOT love to fuck up my life. 

I'd say don't make another account. A perma-ban is a way of removing players from the community.

> [{quoted}](name=Riot Tantram,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=AEUFX6Q6,comment-id=0009,timestamp=2017-01-03T23:10:21.603+0000)

> 
> I'd say don't make another account. A perma-ban is a way of removing players from the community.


http://weknowmemes.com/wp-content/uploads/2012/09/apply-cold-water-to-the-burned-area.jpeg


savage

So to be clear, you were informed of a 14-day ban, but it was escalated to perma without you ever playing a game after the 14-day?

Could happen as a result of a manual review of your case, if you were deemed to be exceedingly toxic. Use of slurs could have lead to such action. If you got chat logs for your 14-day ban, we might be able to offer insight there. 

But dude, if this is your third banned account, the problem isn't that "Riot loves to fuck up your life". You gotta figure out a way to color within the lines.

It's my second banned account. My third one I was forced to make because I was perma banned out of the blue, and I'll get the logs for you in just a moment. I will also point out that alot of what I say is very sarcastic, or aimed to someone I am friends with in real life. We have dark humour, we're cancer memers, we watch Filthy Frank and laugh about depression so don't think I'm being incredibly disgusting to random people for no reason.

**Yeah reading this back I was exceedingly toxic. But Idk how that justifies getting permabanned before doing anything.**

The "%%%%%%%%" stuff is probably slurs/hate speech, which Riot has a zero-tolerance policy regarding. That'll get you a rapidly escalating punishment, so it's not surprising to me that somebody saw your automated 14-day ban, checked your log, and decided to burn your account. Sucks that you weren't informed of that action, but I don't necessarily think a mistake was made. 

I'm all for sarcasm and memes, but you're clearly comfortable talking severe shit to your team on a constant basis, and that shit doesn't fly for long.

Worst thing is being able to mute people doesn't help, because you can just unmute them when you see other people responding to their shit talking. Plus you can't turn off chat in general. It's a shame but I guess I just have to suck it up, shut the fuck up and look forward.

U can unbind your chat key in the ini files. Leaving you no way to respond even if you really wanted to.

Its what some repeat offenders have started doing.
Can you link me a tutorial or something because I think that'd really help me tbh.
Wtf is wrong with you?
i DIdn't even bother reading anymore of that Toxicity, it was Acid to my eyes http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-ODEAkXybGvk/UxdCqHArdaI/AAAAAAAAuZg/cgCCSXIchsE/s1600/MY+EYES.gif

I've seen this happen before.... what happened was that the automated system gave you a punishment of two weeks.

It also notified a Riot employee who manually reviewed your case. This employee decided to hit you with  a perma-ban which is why you've gotten conflicting information. Now I agree that Riot's draconian system is INCREDIBLY bad for the game, for the community and in general, but people don't agree with me so most people will tell you that you got exactly what you deserved.

I don't agree. I believe the draconian system is wrong.

Lol? Draconian usually means old fashioned.

Tell me what age we stopped punishing people for being assholes?

I can now run around my office yelling explictives and telling people i fucked theei moms and no one would bat an eye?

> [{quoted}](name=Jorencice,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=AEUFX6Q6,comment-id=00070000,timestamp=2016-12-30T23:42:42.282+0000)
>
> Draconian means old fashioned.

**Google search**:

dra·co·ni·an
drəˈkōnēən/
adjective
adjective: draconian

    (of laws or their application) excessively harsh and severe.


https://www.merriam-webster.com/dictionary/draconian

Definition of draconian

    1
    :  of, relating to, or characteristic of Draco or the severe code of laws held to have been framed by him

    2
    :  cruel; also :  severe

>Tell me what age we stopped punishing people for being assholes?

Tell me what age we made disliking someone a criminal offense (?)
Outside of Orwell's Dystopia of course.

 You leftists/feminists always seem to come back with the same nonsense but I'm hoping for a new response this time.

**"Far right wing conservative you are talking there m8, ain't gonna get your point."**

Man... only on GD can you be accused of being a far right wing conservative AND a leftist/feminist...

(Hint. The first guy was correct. Im about as anti liberal/Right wing as they come)

But i was born in the south were hospitality is a thing. And you dont say rude ass things to people and expect no repurcussions.

You don't get arrested for saying "rude things" , the government doesn't put you in prison because "MUH HURT FEELZ".

The draconian system is very bad for the community , this is known.

Except this isnt the government. Your anology is shit.

This is a privatly owned business.

Your have to compare it to other businesses.

Go to your job. Wait for someone to annoy you. And then tell them how shit they are at their job.

Id FUCKING LOVE to hear how HR handled that situation.

Because i GUARAN FUCKING TEE you will BOTH get punished.

Also KEK at still being called a leftist. Just yesterday i was advocating that poor people ahould die since they were to poor to afford health insurance. (As right wing as they come)

But k dude.

Irrelevant. My point is to express disapproval of the draconian system.

> Go to your job. Wait for someone to annoy you. And then tell them how shit they are at their job.

This is not a job. Your analogy is garbage.

> Also KEK at still being called a leftist. 

I can only judge you by what you argue here, not by what you pretend to argue elsewhere.

Welp im done with you.

You completely ignored my argument about businesses having their own rules.

Stay salty bro.

Formal =/= Casual

Sigh... just cant help my self.

You signed the ToS AT LEAST once.... (if not more like 300 times if youve been playing as long as i have)

Thus you have to follow the ToS.

You dont you get punished.

One of the rules basically boils dont to "Dont be a jerk"

I know its hard for you liberals to understand because you think your immune to being racist/assholes

But people DO get punished for inappropriate behaviors.

YOU think the TOS is to harsh. I think it works just fine.

Thus i even you out. Sorry bro. I dont want this game turning into CoD.

> [{quoted}](name=Jorencice,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=AEUFX6Q6,comment-id=0007000000000000000000000000000100000000,timestamp=2016-12-31T21:07:17.181+0000)

Red herring.

> TOS is to harsh. I think it works just fine.

That's exactly the problem, you see, leftist/feminists like you think the draconian system is fine, but intelligent men believe that it is unreasonable and must be changed.

Protesting in a civil manner that one disagrees with the draconian system is not wrong. The game's social interactions functioned a lot better when players had the liberty to interact freely rather than through a tight regulatory system which condemns any interaction not considered appropriate by the draconian law. 

"Just don't commit any crimes and you'll be alright bro"
That's not a valid argument in defense of the draconian system.
That's literally the worst argument.

Except its not a strict system.

And dont commit any crimes is a perfectly valid excuse.

I have around 5k games played and ive NEVER NOT EVEN ONCE been punished. Because i dont break the rules. (And it was SOOO hard not breaking the rules /s)

If the system was to strict it would have rules that wasnt possible to follow like north korea.

If rules were made up on the spot or changed randonly i could agree that it would be to hard for you plebians to follow the rules.

But they dont...

Also ive been playing since literally beta AND NEVER EVVVVVVVEEEEEEEERRRRRRRRR has toxicity been allowed. Even the tribunal more often than not punished toxic people.

> [{quoted}](name=Jorencice,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=AEUFX6Q6,comment-id=000700000000000000000000000000010000000000000000,timestamp=2017-01-01T01:34:44.685+0000)
>
> Except its not a strict system.

Having played many online games since the beginning of online games back during the MSN gaming zone days and prior.... this is the most strict system I have ever seen in a video game, hands down.

> And dont commit any crimes is a perfectly valid excuse.

No it is not.

That's literally the line used to justify draconian systems. 
It goes alongside "**If you have nothing to hide and have done nothing wrong, what's the harm in suspending habeas corpus?**" although that is a bit of an extreme example.

> I have around 5k games played and ive NEVER NOT EVEN ONCE been punished. 

I have about 20k games played.
I have had one permabanned account (early S2) and this account has been up for years, I went from zero-to-permaban because of extremely trivial offenses. Riot saw fit to do this but then the punishment was overturned.

Despite it being rescinded, it showed me that the draconian system is incredibly unjust.

>Because i dont break the rules.

See argument #1 in this post.

> If the system was to strict it would have rules that wasnt possible to follow like north korea.

That would not be a draconian system, that would be an absurd system.

These are not the same concept.

> Also ive been playing since literally beta AND NEVER EVVVVVVVEEEEEEEERRRRRRRRR has toxicity been allowed. Even the tribunal more often than not punished toxic people.

Correct.

However the system went from too lenient to absolutely perfect, to overly harsh to full blown draconian system over the course of the past 7 years.

Hey got a quick dentistry-related question.

Is it possible to floss too often? Like it's recommended to floss once a day. What if you floss after every meal and then brush your teeth? Is it bad to floss too often?

> [{quoted}](name=TyrekGoldenspear,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=AEUFX6Q6,comment-id=00070000000000000000000000000000,timestamp=2016-12-31T02:57:09.817+0000)
>
> Hey got a quick dentistry-related question.

That seemed to come out of nowhere but very well, let's see what it is....

> Is it possible to floss too often? 

Yes but not really.

The bigger issue is not "a person flosses too much" but rather that they may floss incorrectly. If you are flossing after every meal, as long as you are not using cheap/garbage floss or (Good lord) toothpicks, you will be fine. Floss gently and smoothly, there should be no issue even if it is done 3 or 4 times a day.

If a person flosses incorrectly, at best the flossing will be ineffective and at worst they will stimulate the gingiva in such a way that gingivitis occurs or even worse than that, cause lacerations highly prone to infection but we're getting into hyper extremes here. I very much doubt you're doing anything like that. So unless you're doing something **VERY** wrong, you have nothing to concern yourself with.

Lol. BORN POOR is different than still being a peice of shit who hasnt worked a single day in their life. Those are the people i despise.

My dad was born dirt poor. Like creaky walls no food dirt poor.

Now he owns a company that makes a million+ a year. Through HARD ass work and many long 15 hour long 7 days a week working.

People who dont try are pitiful and deserve no help.

If riot wants to fix toxicity in league they need to put more emphasis on punishing trolls. I feel you on this one actually. The only games I lose my cool in are ones where intentional feeding happened, or troll picking champions, etc. Trolling is not punished in this game, yet toxicity is. Toxicity happens overwhelmingly because of trolling. They are punishing the reaction, not the root cause.

You don't know the definition of toxicity at all.

I just had a game with this guy, I willingly gave him my role and I still single-handedly carried him while he was completely useless.  He spent the whole game trying to teach me how to play and when i responded with a few lines about how he was wrong, he cried in all chat to report me.  

Please don't give this cancer any attention.

lol, man you have some serious issues. How are you going to be so obsessed with me to track my league posts? this poor kid is what toxicity really is.. lol

I wanted to have a reasonable conversation and find out if you actually understand how disgusting your behavior is.

Not only is asking for reports in all chat a bannable offense, you're asking for false reports, purely because your feelings were hurt when i said something you didn't like.  If you're going to act like a total asshole and try to teach people how to play when they're solo carrying you then make sure to mute them because the response is probably going to hurt your sensitive little feelings.  

Just because I go off on you doesn't make me toxic.  Sorry.  Never been banned or chat restricted and I never will, even though little freaks like you sometimes send false reports.

i played 6 games today had 1) guy who was deathreating 2) 2 trolling guys ( blitz allistar botlane in gold ranked ) 3) intentionall feeder ( 3 tears tiamat no jungle item jungle amumu ) ive send 3 tickets to riot support hope they will do smth Kappa
I couldn't agree more. Sure it doesn't justify toxicity but it does make me wonder if Riot are paying attention.
i think that if you are a jerk as a community we have decided we dont want you  here, and riot has upheld our wishes. goodluck in your next game.
Make another dog. Don't let a big corporation tell you what you can and can't do!
Silly question, but since this isn't your first account I'll ask.  Are you checking the right email account?
I checked every single one, and not a single one has ever received an email about bans.

Spam filters?  I've lost a lot of things to Gmail randomly deciding it was spam.

Autofilters?  I had a filter turned on and was wondering why I wasn't receiving emails from a place for ages.  Turned out I was, I just wasn't seeing them.

Also, it sounds like you don't know exactly which email goes with this account.  

Again, just silly questions to make sure all your bases are covered.  But, perhaps submit a support ticket asking for it to be resent?
I've had 2 bans and a suspension. Neither of the 3 emails those accounts use have ever received an email about it.
If you didn't get any email then your best bet for more info would be to file a support ticket about it.
PS. By the way, just out of curiosity? Did you send warnings to the people you were gonna rage at?

"Stop taking my jungle camps."
"Don't base, go in." "Okay no more ganks then."
Were those "warnings" effective at all?

It was pretty much like every time I tell someone not to do something, they would repeatedly do it and when I decide to no longer help them they would troll or something. I don't know how to explain it further than that.

Not finding your email notification is unfortunate. It has nothing whatsoever to do with the fairness of your punishment, which you've recognized you deserved : "_Okay fine I'll take that I am toxic_".

So yes, your punishment is fair. Try to look through your spam folder, or check on your forum account what email is actually attached to your account. Because the email is sent by a computer program, so it doesn't really make sense to think "they haven't sent it'.

I believe only bans issued by the automated system send an email.

If the ban is by manual review, I believe you have to create a support ticket for details.
